alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:55PM EDT until June 11 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LINCOLN AND NORTHERN CASEY COUNTIES... At 355 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Liberty, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hustonville, South Fork, Boneyville, Kings Mountain, Jumbo, Mount Salem, Geneva, Middleburg, Beech Bottom and Ellisburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
